snippet: Finance ministers in Europe have agreed to centralize bank oversight in the euro zone. European leaders are expected to hail the plan, which gives the European Central Bank “the leading supervisory role over lenders,” as a sign they are taking...
abstract: Finance ministers in Europe have agreed to centralize bank oversight in the euro zone. European leaders are expected to hail the plan, which gives the European Central Bank “the leading supervisory role over lenders,” as a sign they are taking concrete steps to maintain the viability of the euro.
lead_paragraph: Finance ministers in Europe have agreed to centralize bank oversight in the euro zone. European leaders are expected to hail the plan, which gives the European Central Bank “the leading supervisory role over lenders,” as a sign they are taking concrete steps to maintain the viability of the euro, The New York Times reports. Read more »

headline.main: European Officials Agree to Single Bank Supervisor
